item.title: Music Streaming Player for Discord with Google Drive using Node.js
item.description: Gists Overview This is a sample script for the music streaming player for Discord with Google Drive using Node.js. Description This sample script can achieve to play the music when uses the voice channel on Discord. The music files are put in the specific folder of Google Drive. This script downloads all music files and plays the music files at the voice channel with the stream. Usage 1. Register BOT to Discord At first, please register your BOT to Discord.
